TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ToolboxItemContainer extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

span.span: Encapsulates a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一個簡單的類別，封裝為了提高效率。 is a simple class that encapsulates a for efficiency. 您可以擁有會一律載入的單一類別，延後載入直到需要為止。By having a single class that is always loaded, you can defer the loading of the until it is needed. 因為新的類別可以衍生自，您可以載入，反而可以載入組件已不在記憶體中。Because new classes can be derived from , you could load a that could, in turn, load an assembly that is not already in memory. 大型集合的物件，這可能會造成大量的組件載入，這會降低效能。For a large collection of objects, this could cause a large number of assemblies to be loaded, which decreases performance. 相反地，工具箱服務只會處理經過物件，並擷取其包含只在必要時。Instead, the toolbox service deals only with objects and retrieves their contained only when necessary. 設計用來保存任何快取的資料，從。The is designed to hold any cached data from the . 預設實作只會保留的篩選條件，但衍生類別可以選擇快取的名稱、 影像和其他資訊。The default implementation only holds the filter of the , but deriving classes may choose to cache the name, image, and other information. 物件支援兩種形式的序列化： 可以透過標準的執行階段序列化進行序列化，以及它們也可以載入和儲存自己從。 objects support two forms of serialization: they can be serialized through standard runtime serialization, and they can also load and save themselves from a . 前者提供非常簡單的方法，以儲存永續性儲存體的物件。The former provides a very easy way to save objects to a persistent storage. 後者可用來整合混合的資料存放區格式的物件。The latter provides a way to integrate objects with mixed data storage formats.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: A data object that represents a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `data`參數可能會包含所提供的資料類別。The `data` parameter may contain data provided by the class. 它可能包含可以由其中一個讀取的資料已由使用者提供的建立者。It may contain data that can be read by one of the creators that have been supplied by the user. 它也可能有的剪貼簿格式的資料指派給它的建立者。It may also be data with a clipboard format that has a creator assigned to it. 在此情況下，視需要建立。In this case, the is created on demand.

para.span: 一般而言，不需要覆寫的序列化機制。

span.span: Generally, it is not necessary to override the serialization mechanism for a .

para.span: 物件會實作序列化儲存傳回屬性。

span.span: objects implement serialization by saving the returned from the property.

para.span: 當您覆寫，並提供您自己自訂的資料，此資料會包含預設實作。

span.span: When you override and provide your own custom data, this data is included with the default implementation.

para.span: 只有當您想要儲存私用的詳細資訊，請覆寫預設序列化實作，不應公開透過公開的資料物件。

span.span: Override the default serialization implementation only if you intend to store private details about this that should not be exposed through the public data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `creators`參數是一堆物件表示的任何自訂產生篩選條件時應包含建立者。The `creators` parameter is a collection of objects that represent any custom creators that should be included when the filter is generated. 自訂的建立者可能會導致篩選條件。Custom creators may contribute to the filters. 這個參數可以是`null`如果沒有建立者所需。This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed. 型別儲存在可能有與其相關聯的篩選。The types stored in a may have a filter associated with them. 篩選可用來限制可放置在設計工具的工具。Filters can be used to restrict the tools that can be placed on designers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `creators`參數是集合物件表示的任何自訂應包含時的建立者取得。The `creators` parameter is a collection of objects that represent any custom creators that should be included when the is obtained. 這個參數可以是`null`如果沒有建立者所需。This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed. 方法會傳回代表儲存在資料。The method returns a that represents the data stored in the . 永遠不會傳回`null`，也不會它曾引發例外狀況，除了在極端的情況下 （例如，記憶體不足）。 never returns `null`, nor does it ever raise an exception, except in extreme cases (for example, out of memory). 如果不可傳遞，適當的例外狀況內嵌在特殊。If a cannot be fabricated, the appropriate exception is embedded within a special . 例外狀況時擲回方法，在此特殊呼叫。The exception is thrown when the method on this special is called. 這會將放在使用者動作時的例外狀況。This puts the exception at the point of user action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該呼叫方法修改或設定工具箱項目時。You should call the method when the toolbox item is modified or configured. 也應該呼叫它，如果新、 有哪些變更篩選時，會加入。You should also call it if a new , which the changes the filter, is added.
